title: Shahdara DCP Amit Sharma who was injured in Delhi riots is alive
subtitle: DCP Amit Sharma who was injured during CAA clashes in Delhi is not dead. He is safe and out of danger. So, the claim is FALSE.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A message that DCP Amit Sharma who was injured during CAA clashes in Delhi lost his life, is making viral on social media. Let’s check the authenticity of the message.

Claim: DCP Amit Sharma who was injured during CAA clashes in Delhi lost his life. Fact: DCP Amit Sharma who was injured during CAA clashes in Delhi is not dead. He is safe and out of danger. So, the claim is FALSE.

Shahdara DCP Amit Sharma was injured during CAA clashes in Delhi on 24 February 2020. When looked on Google for the health status of DCP Amit Sharma, a tweet by ‘ANI’ on 25 February 2020 was found. As per the tweet, DCP Amit Sharma who was injured during clashes has regained his consciousness and is now safe and out of danger.

Also, as per the ‘ANI’ article dated 26 February 2020, Home Minister Amit Shah has spoken to the family of injured DCP Amit Sharma and inquired regarding his health status.

Jitender Sharma, a journalist, has also posted the recent picture of DCP Amit Sharma in the hospital. It can be seen here.

To summarize, Shahdara DCP Amit Sharma who was injured during CAA clashes in Delhi is not dead. He is safe and out of danger.
